title: AI startup Tavus founder says users talk to its AI Santa ‘for hours’ per day
description: Tavus has launched a new experience where you can chat with an AI Santa that asks personal questions and remembers your interests.
content: Tavus has launched a new experience where you can chat with an AI Santa that asks personal questions and remembers your interests.
